name: The Darkest Road
overview: Commodore Format 1995/02 (Issue #53) + 1995/05 (Issue #56). The first part of a two-part text adventure that sees you stomping through marshes, wiggling your toes in magic shoes and snogging a mermaid. You also have to save the land from the evil ravages of the Black Wanderer with the magical power of the Silent Song.
